think_procedure.step2: Understand the normal operation of the knob, which is to specify a fraction of the table size to add to autovacuum_analyze_threshold when deciding whether to trigger an ANALYZE.
think_procedure.step3: Determine if the knob has any special values that alter its normal operation significantly.
think_procedure.step4: Research or recall if setting 'autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor' to a specific value (like -1 or 0) disables its normal function or triggers a special behavior.
think_procedure.step5: Conclude whether 'autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor' is a 'special knob' based on the findings.
